root.name: Duck Dodgers
root.description: OverviewBased on the wild adventures of Daffy Duck and Marvin the Martian, Duck Dodgers is a 3D platformer similar to Super Mario 64 and Banjo Kazooie. Developed by Infogrames and published by Paradigm Ent, released on Sept. 16th 2000 in North America.GameplayDuck Dodgers contains 5 planets, these planets contain sub levels by completing a sub level you will unlock another sub level that branches off and so forth. After completing the sub levels to a planet you will unlock a boss fight these bosses are from the Looney Tune universe for example, Hassan the ruthless Arabian king has an Arabian-themed planet, Rocky the pint-size gangster with the ten-gallon fedora inhabits a gangster planet, and so on. The control scheme is similar to Mario 64 with its jumping and stomping aspects.
